## Getting started

Please make sure you read our documentation on how to [write code for components](https://github.com/rarolabs/rarui/tree/main/packages/implementations/react), [stories](https://rarui.rarolabs.com.br/docs/components) and [styles](https://github.com/rarolabs/rarui/tree/main/packages/styles).

- [ ] Provide a list of changes
- [ ] Include images to help better visualize your work
- [ ] If your PR closes an issue, please link it
- [Â ] Add reviewers
- [ ] Add a label to help better understand what your changes are related to
